definitions: a large extinct flightless bird resembling the emu, formerly found in New Zealand.

notes.text: Family Dinornithidae: several genera and species; Dinornis maximus was the tallest known bird, with a height of about 10 feet (3 m), but Megalapteryx didinus, which may have survived until the early 19th century, was much smaller

shortDefinitions: large extinct flightless bird formerly found in New Zealand
